northern-michigan.subtitle: Great Lakes Getaway
northern-michigan.description: Explore Northern Michigan's clear waters, coastal towns, and dense forests. This trip highlights some of the most scenic parts of the Great Lakes region with a focus on simple, memorable experiences.

highlights.name: Farm Club
highlights.description: Farm Club seamlessly blends farming, dining, and community. Nestled just outside Traverse City, it offers a unique experience where visitors can enjoy fresh, seasonal meals sourced directly from its own farm, sip on house-brewed beer and cider, and shop a thoughtfully curated market.

highlights.name: Pictured Rocks Kayaking
highlights.description: Experience the majestic Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore from a unique perspective as you paddle along towering cliffs, through natural stone arches, and past stunning mineral-stained rock formations.

highlights.name: Chapel Rock Trail
highlights.description: This iconic 6.2-mile loop trail offers the perfect blend of forest hiking and Lake Superior shoreline views. The trail leads to Chapel Rock, a unique geological formation topped by a lone pine tree.

arizona.subtitle: Desert Southwest Adventure
arizona.description: Discover the dramatic landscapes and rich cultural heritage of Arizona. From the majestic Grand Canyon to the red rocks of Sedona, this journey showcases the diverse beauty of the American Southwest.

highlights.name: Grand Canyon Sunrise
highlights.description: Experience the breathtaking transformation of the Grand Canyon as dawn breaks over the horizon, painting the ancient rock layers in brilliant hues of red, orange, and gold.

highlights.name: Cathedral Rock
highlights.description: One of Sedona's most iconic formations, Cathedral Rock trail offers a challenging but rewarding climb with stunning panoramic views of the red rock landscape.

highlights.name: Antelope Canyon Tour
highlights.description: Explore the mesmerizing slot canyons carved by wind and water, where sunbeams create spectacular light shows in the narrow, twisting passages.

washington.subtitle: Pacific Northwest Explorer
washington.description: Journey through Washington's diverse landscapes, from rainforests to volcanic peaks. Experience the raw beauty of the Pacific Northwest with its ancient forests, rugged coastline, and alpine meadows.

highlights.name: Olympic Rainforest
highlights.description: Immerse yourself in one of the largest temperate rainforests in the U.S., where ancient trees draped in moss create an otherworldly atmosphere.

highlights.name: Whale Watching
highlights.description: Set sail from the San Juan Islands to spot orcas, humpback whales, and other marine wildlife in their natural habitat.

highlights.name: Mount Rainier Skyline
highlights.description: Hike through subalpine meadows with stunning views of Mount Rainier, especially beautiful during wildflower season.

smoky-mountains.subtitle: Appalachian Adventure
smoky-mountains.description: Explore America's most visited national park, where misty mountains, diverse wildlife, and rich cultural heritage create an unforgettable experience.

highlights.name: Alum Cave Trail
highlights.description: A dramatic trail featuring unique geological formations, mountain views, and historic sites, leading to Mount LeConte.

highlights.name: Cades Cove Loop
highlights.description: Cycle or drive through this scenic valley, rich in wildlife and historic buildings from early European settlements.

highlights.name: Firefly Viewing
highlights.description: Witness the magical synchronous fireflies during their annual mating display, a rare natural phenomenon.

southern-california.subtitle: Pacific Coast Paradise
southern-california.description: Experience the diverse landscapes of Southern California, from coastal highways to desert national parks, combining urban excitement with natural wonders.

highlights.name: Joshua Tree
highlights.description: Explore the unique desert landscape where two distinct desert ecosystems meet, featuring the iconic Joshua trees and dramatic rock formations.

highlights.name: Pacific Coast Highway
highlights.description: Drive along one of America's most scenic routes, stopping at pristine beaches and coastal viewpoints.

highlights.name: Channel Islands
highlights.description: Kayak through sea caves and spot unique wildlife on these remote and pristine islands off the coast.
